# Problem 11.40 - Statically Indeterminate Problems {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam is subjected to force F = 10 kN as shown. If length L = 2 m, determine the reaction force at support B. Assume EI = 12,500 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
